tool_description: Real Time services of Bourgarel Conseil
name: BC Real Time
title: BC Real Time

api_list.name: Notion Service
api_list.description: Watch Notion database and launch Make.com scenario
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bc-real-time.p.rapidapi.com/bcTransferNotion/ddd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bc-real-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bc-real-time.p.rapidapi.com/bcTransferNotion/{notion_database_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bc-real-time.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
